ch.aplu.android

Class GGAlertDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.android.GGAlertDialog

  • public class GGAlertDialog
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to show a modeless dialog. To get the user response, a GGAlertDialogListener must be registered.

    When the dialog window is shown, the current window is grayed, but code in the game thread is still executing. It's up do you, do stop the game thread temporarily by calling GameGrid.doPause() and resume it in the GGAlertDialogListener notifyResponse() callback by calling GameGrid.doRun().
    Different types of dialogs will be implemented in the future.

    • Method Detail

      • showInputDialog

        public void showInputDialog(android.app.Activity activity,
                   java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String prompt,
                   java.lang.String init)
        Shows the modeless dialog box with an edit field and two buttons (Ok, Cancel). When one of the buttons are pressed, a registered GGAlertDialogListener returns the user action.
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity where to show the dialog
        title - the title text of the dialog box
        prompt - the prompt text of the dialog box
        init - the text shown in the edit field when the box pops-up

      • showInputDialog

        public void showInputDialog(java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String prompt,
                   java.lang.String init)
        Same as show(Activity activity, String title, String prompt, String init) with activity = GameGrid.myGameGrid;

      • showInputDialog

        public void showInputDialog(java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String prompt)
        Same as show(String title, String prompt, String init) with init = "".

      • addDialogListener

        public void addDialogListener(GGAlertDialogListener listener)
        Registers the given GGAlertDialogListener to get callback notifications.
        Parameters:
        listener - the GGAlertDialogListener to register
